title: Cinefantastique Vol 03 No 4 (Winter 1974)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Feature on The Exorcist, including interviews with director William Friedkin, star Jason Miller and makeup man Dick Smith. Additional articles on Flesh Gordon, Them!, Young Frankenstein, Dark Star, and reviews of Captain Kronos: Vampire Hunter, Frankenstein and the Monster from Hell, Jonathan, The Parallax View, The Terminal Man, Phase IV, and many more.
